variable_label: Cohort member anonymised ID for LLC

1986: Age of cohort member when sat assessments (from fdoc_mt fdoc_yr)
1986: Raw Vocabulary Test score (cv01 to cv075)
1986: Estimated reading age at age 16 (derived from zb16read and average age)
1986: (CM's parent) total Malaise score - grouped based on distribution
1986: (CM's parent) total Malaise score grouped ( age 16)
1986: CM's parent gave information on at least 1 Rutter question
1986: (CM's parent)  total Rutter behaviour score  - grouped
DV: School Type Age 16 (derived from STYPE
